Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.patterns

Class AdjacentPattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.patterns.Pattern
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.patterns.AdjacentPattern
public class AdjacentPattern extends Pattern
A pattern describing one or more groups of adjacent tiles of the same type

  • Constructor Details

    • AdjacentPattern

      public AdjacentPattern(String name, int minTiles, int points) throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Constructor for adjacent pattern
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pattern
      minTiles - the minimum amount of tiles a group should have for it to be deleted
      points - the points to be given for each deleted group
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if any of the params are invalid

    • AdjacentPattern

      public AdjacentPattern(String name, int minTiles, int minGroups, int points) throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Constructor for adjacent pattern
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the pattern
      minTiles - the minimum amount of tiles a group should have for it to be deleted
      minGroups - the minimum number of groups to be found to return the points (and not 0)
      points - the points to be given for each deleted group
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if any of the params are invalid

  • Method Details

    • checkParameters

      private void checkParameters() throws InvalidPatternParameterException
      Checks the constructor parameters
      Throws:
      InvalidPatternParameterException - if the parameters are invalid

    • getPatternFunction

      public Function<List<List<Optional<Tile>>>,Integer> getPatternFunction()
      Returns the pattern function
      Specified by:
      getPatternFunction in class Pattern
      Returns:
      a function that given the bookshelf EDITS the bookshelf, deleting all the tiles contained in the groups with at least minTiles tiles if the number of deleted groups is more than or equal to minGroups it also returns the points (that could be interpreted as the actual points or just used to check if it satisfies the pattern)

    • findAndDeleteGroup

      private static boolean findAndDeleteGroup(List<List<Optional<Tile>>> bookshelf, Integer minTiles)
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the bookshelf
      minTiles - the minimum amount of tiles a group should have for it to be deleted
      Returns:
      if a group of at least minTiles has been found (and deleted)

    • removeTiles

      private static void removeTiles(List<List<Optional<Tile>>> bookshelf, List<List<Boolean>> mask)
      Removes tiles from the given bookshelf according to the matrix
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the bookshelf
      mask - a matrix representing the tiles to be removed

    • countAdjacentTiles

      private static Integer countAdjacentTiles(List<List<Boolean>> mask)
      Counts the amount of true in the given mask
      Parameters:
      mask - a matrix representing the tiles to be counted
      Returns:
      the amount of true in the given matrix

    • markAdjacentTiles

      private static void markAdjacentTiles(List<List<Optional<Tile>>> bookshelf, Tile checkedTile, List<List<Boolean>> mask)
      Recursive method, marks the given tile on the mask calls itself on nearby tiles of the same type (right, top, left, bottom), if any
      Parameters:
      bookshelf - the bookshelf
      checkedTile - the currently checked tile
      mask - a matrix representing the tiles of the same type of the starting tile
